mapper.insert: insert into UserInfo (userID, accountID, accountPassword, userName, registerNumber, mobileNumber, gender, email) values (UserInfo_userID_seq.nextval, #{accountID}, #{accountPassword}, #{userName}, #{registerNumber}, #{mobileNumber}, #{gender}, #{email})
mapper.select: select accountID from UserInfo where accountID = #{accountID}
select accountPassword from UserInfo where accountID = #{accountID}
